text: The React boilerplate is still supported AFAIK; it’s still the best place to get started using React on HS, but I think there’s a lot of confusion from devs about HOW to use React on HS. It doesn’t make sense to build a full React-based site on the CMS, but rather to use React (or Vue, or whatever else) for highly interactive or “app-like” experiences in certain areas of a site.
